ee_data module¶

This contains the functions that read KMD EE data from disk or database.

This module follows a simple naming convention:

The functions starting with “read” read data from the MS SQL database.

Functions starting with “store” write to files on disk, and files starting with “retrieve” retrieves them from disk.

ee_data.INSTALLATIONS_FILE = 'var/installations'¶

CUSTOMER RECORDS

ee_data.read_customer_records(cursor)[source]¶

Read customer relations from database.

Read all data regarding customers, customer roles and customer relationships and map them for easy lookup in case something changes. Basically, by creating a dictionary with customer number as key.

ee_data.read_installation_records(cursor)[source]¶

Read relevant Tref installation records from database.

Reads all relevant data about installations and meters.

ee_data.retrieve_customer_records()[source]¶

Retrieve customer records from disk.

ee_data.retrieve_installation_records()[source]¶

Read installation information from disk.

ee_data.store_customer_records(customer_relations)[source]¶

Store customer records on disk.

This is a simple, no-frills cache using the pickle module.

ee_data.store_installation_records(installations)[source]¶

Store installation information in file for later use.
